content: I was wondering what codes refer to the Vaccination details and testing (especially covid) and is there a directory of other codes for different parts of data?

I don't have a simple answer to this request. The COVID-19 Knowledge Accelerator has been focused on FHIR Resource and terminology development for the expression of evidence (scientific knowledge) and statistics, and has focused mainly on therapeutic interventions for COVID-19, so have not directly explored the code systems or value sets for vaccination and testing.

CVX has codes for COVID-19 vaccines in US. See the SMART Health Card Vaccination and Testing (SHC-VT) pages
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PHWG/SMART+Health+Card+-+Vaccination+Credential+IG is a good starting point
Zulip https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/284830-smart.2Fhealth-cards

https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/284830-smart.2Fhealth-cards/topic/FHIR.20IG.3A.20int'l.20code.20systems/near/238286080 references a pull request dealing with vaccine codes

WHO SVC uses ICD11 (covid codes not formally released)
Zulip https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/281981-svc
